results.content: I did learn how to make chrome extensions.  But I feel the course is too short for the money.  It could benefit from two or three more advanced projects that demonstrate greater browser extension capabilities.
results.content_html: I did learn how to make chrome extensions. But I feel the course is too short for the money. It could benefit from two or three more advanced projects that demonstrate greater browser extension capabilities.

results.content: Great beginner course for learning how to create Chrome  Browser Extensions.  I appreciate the Instructor working through the examples and not trying to hide his code errors. Every developer sometimes have syntax errors that's part of learning.  Thank you!! I hope you make more videos on web scraping extensions.
